headline: Caterpillar (CAT) Valuation Check After Strong Q3 Revenue, Cautious Earnings Outlook and Insider Selling
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) is back in the spotlight after stronger than expected Q3 revenue collided with cautious earnings expectations and a wave of insider selling, raising fair questions about how much upside is left. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. Despite the latest pullback, with the share price down 4.43 percent over one day to around 597 dollars and 89 cents, Caterpillar still has strong momentum, highlighted by a roughly 66 percent year to date share price return and a robust multi...

headline: Jim Cramer Says Industrials Like Caterpillar “Perfectly Fit the Environment”
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer highlighted in light of the Fed rate cut. Cramer highlighted the company while recommending buying industrials. The Mad Money host commented: “Finally… You can buy any industrial because the hedge fund playbook says that industrials benefit from lower rates, even if you think it doesn’t […]
